  "Allegations" : "COMPLAINTANT ALLEGES THAT BARBERIS ADVISED HIS CLIENT TO SURRENDER A VARIABLE ANNUITY THAT HE HAD RECOMMENDED ONLY 18 MONTHS BEFORE TO PURCHASE A FIXED ANNUITY FROM ANOTHER BROKER DEALER WHERE BARBERIS IS NOW ASSOCIATED COSTING THE CUSTOMER $38,000.00 IN PENALTIES AND SURRENDER CHARGES.
